author: barnabasbusa
content:
Current images used on devnet 3:


lighthouse: ethpandaops/lighthouse:unstable ✅ 
lodestar: ethpandaops/lodestar:unstable ✅ 
nimbus: ethpandaops/nimbus-eth2:fusaka-devnet-3
prysm: ethpandaops/prysm-beacon-chain:fusaka-devnet-3
prysm_validator: ethpandaops/prysm-validator:fusaka-devnet-3
teku: ethpandaops/teku:master ✅ 
grandine: ethpandaops/grandine:peerdas-fulu
besu: ethpandaops/besu:main ✅ 
geth: ethpandaops/geth:master ✅ 
erigon: ethpandaops/erigon:main ✅ 
nethermind: ethpandaops/nethermind:master ✅ 
reth: ethpandaops/reth:fusaka-devnet-3
nimbusel: ethpandaops/nimbus-eth1:master ✅ 


Please let me know if I should update your tag to something else. This network has watchtower on it, so the latest image with the same tag will be pulled automatically.
